Hakizimana Yussuf (amụrụ na 30 June 1990) nke a maara dị ka Kebby Boy bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu nke pop, rap na afrobeats, nke a bịanyere aka na IBN Music France ugbu a. A maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya "Sina Lawama", abụ na-agwakọta ụdị pop na ụdị afro pop.
A mụrụ Kebby Boy na mpaghara Rumonge, Burundi, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
Kebby dere abụ akpọrọ Tonya nke Roméo onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri kirimba haziri na 2007
Ọ malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya site na idekọ egwu na studio, wee wepụta egwu mbụ ya aha ya bụ Chozi Langu na 2008
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke Islam na Burundi ma nwee diplọma mba.
Mgbe a tọha pụrụ otu egwu ya bụ Wanyama Pori, e nyere ya onye nduzi nke akara ahụ
Na 10 Jenụwarị 2016, ọ bịanyere aka na akara Light Entertainment Company nke o ji dekọọ egwu dịka My Dodo, Sina Lawama wdg
na ụlọ ọrụ Wasafi Records nke onye egwu egwu Tanzanian Diamond Platnumz.
